installer.title: Floorp 安裝程式
installer.description: 安裝 Floorp 瀏覽器，開啟一份注重隱私、快速且可自由客製化的瀏覽體驗。
installer.adminRightsEnabled: 為所有具有管理權限的使用者安裝。
installer.customPathRequired: 自訂安裝路徑需要管理員權限。

exitConfirmation.title: Cancel Installation?
exitConfirmation.message: Canceling the installation process will prevent Floorp from being installed.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: Floorp is designed with user privacy as the top priority. Protect your online privacy with tracking prevention features and secure browsing mode.

performance.title: Fast Performance
performance.description: Optimized engine provides speed for everything from page loading to tab switching, making your browsing experience smooth.

customization.title: Rich Customization
customization.description: Floorp offers rich customization options. You can customize everything from the user interface to features to suit your preferences.

extensions.title: Extensive Extensions
extensions.description: Compatible with Firefox extensions, allowing you to add your favorite tools and services to your browser.

multiplatform.title: Multi-Platform Support
multiplatform.description: Available on various platforms including Windows, macOS, and Linux. Enjoy the same experience everywhere.
